practiceAreas: Personal Injury|Motor Vehicle Accidents|Boating and Jet Ski Accidents|Medical Malpractice and Nursing Home Negligence|Wrongful Death|Product Liability|Class Action
description:
Regardless of how careful you are in your own actions, another person's negligence could leave you with a costly and life-changing personal injury. The attorneys at Garvin Injury Law in Naples, Florida, understand how devastating an injury can be, and we devote ourselves to help victims and their loved ones seek compensation for the physical, emotional and financial harms they endured. Whether your injury is the result of a car crash, slip-and-fall accident, boating accident or some other unfortunate event, our team will serve as your staunch advocate in the pursuit of justice.

Our law firm focuses strictly on helping victims of injury recover compensation. From the initial filing phase through negotiations to litigation, we are well-versed in every aspect of the personal injury claims process. We apply our knowledge and experience to each case we take on with the goal of maximizing compensation for our clients. In addition to vehicle accidents, we are no stranger to cases involving the following:

• Birth injury
• Brain injury
• Medical malpractice
• Nursing home abuse
• Premises liability
• Product liability, including motor vehicle defects
• Wrongful death
• Bad faith insurance

Garvin Injury Law has over 40 years of experience and has secured millions of dollars in compensation for our clients. Founding attorney Jeffrey R. Garvin in particular has a reputation for recovering awards in excess of $1 million. His success earned him a top AV peer review rating from the Martindale-Hubble group,* a listing in Law and Leading Attorneys and the title of a Florida Super Lawyer.

Attorney Leland Garvin has proven to be a valuable addition to the Garvin legal team. Since entering the field of personal injury litigation, he too has gained several recognitions. Our firm offers free consultations and accepts credit cards.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
